title: Kimchi and Honey Dipping Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Kimchi and Honey Dipping Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
6
tablespoons
unsalted butter
9
tablespoons
kimchi paste
(see note)
1
tablespoon
honey
1 1/2
teaspoons
toasted sesame seeds
Directions
Melt butter in a small saucepan over low heat. Add kimchi paste, honey, and sesame seeds. Continue to cook, whisking constantly, until emulsified and combined into a rich sauce. Transfer to a bowl and serve.
